original_text:
She looks well to the ways of her household
    and does not eat the bread of idleness.
korean_text: 자기의 집안 일을 보살피고 게을리 얻은 양식을 먹지 아니하나니

sentences.original_text: She looks well to the ways of her household
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 자기 집안의 일을 잘 살핍니다.

sentences.original_text: and does not eat the bread of idleness.
